_header: Alas Jesu Thy love is lorn
_description: A lament for Christ on account of sin, in John Grimestone’s sermon notes — three lines

NLS18721.Transcription:
Allas iesu þi loue is lornAllas iesu þi det is
                    suornAllas iesu þi bane is born
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 35.
